title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Digital Literacy-Based EFL Integrated Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and expertise in scientific disciplines
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can create English presentation materials using digital resources (podcasts, infographics, etc.) tailored to science-related work scenarios.
Learners can revise and improve content through English peer feedback in digital environments (e.g., cloud collaboration tools).
Learners can present three or more criteria for evaluating the credibility of digital content (videos, blogs, etc.) explaining scientific topics in English.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
